name: MCTS GO
description:
What is MCTS GO?

MCTS GO is my bacherlor thesis for a degree in Videogame Design and Development. The focus of it was to create an AI you can play against or play against friends if you so choose. The AI uses the MCTS algorithm.

GO?

Go is a board game originated in China 2000 years ago, and is the most ancient game that is still played currently! It is also known to be the most complicated game (mathematically speaking) of the traditional board games.

You don't know how to play go? You can check it out here! https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rules_of_Gohttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rules_of_Go

MCTS?

It is an achronym for Monte Carlo Tree Seach, which as the name implies, is a search algorithm that uses semi-random simulations to try to compute which is the best possible move.

If you want to learn how MCTS works, you can take look here! http://www.incompleteideas.net/609%20dropbox/other%20readings%20and%20resources/...
